attributes.action: Immediately reduce the number of new entrants to Medical school nationally.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This government has, over the last 10 years, dramatically increased the number of doctors graduating from university, all with extremely large debt and with aspirations to serve the the British Public via the NHS.  In the fall out from the current MTAS/MMC debacle, it has become clear that there are simply not enough training opportunities for current graduates, let alone the huge numbers due to graduate even this year.

Student numbers at medical school must be cut immediately.
